title: KUT from the Kloth Mia High-Rise Ankle Skinny Jeans
description: HIGH-RISE FIT: The KUT from the Kloth jeans offer a chic and flattering silhouette with their high-rise design. The slim fit through the waist and hips is combined with the skinny leg. This creates a sleek and polished look that accentuates your figure. Perfect for pairing with casual and dressy tops, these jeans offer versatile styling options that are ideal for any occasion.

FADED INDIGO WASH: These women’s high-rise skinny jeans feature a beautiful indigo blue wash with whiskering and fading details, adding a touch of vintage charm to your wardrobe. The artfully distressed look enhances the jeans' overall appeal, giving them a worn-in, lived-in vibe that's perfect for everyday wear. This classic wash is timeless and trendy, making it a staple piece in any denim collection.

STRETCH FABRIC: Crafted from a blend of cotton, polyester, and elastane, the jeans for women with a high rise provide a comfortable stretch that moves with you throughout the day. The soft, breathable fabric ensures a snug fit without sacrificing comfort, making these jeans ideal for all-day wear. Whether you're running errands or enjoying a night out, these jeans offer the perfect combination of style and comfort.

FUNCTIONAL: Featuring a five-pocket design, these women's jeans with skinny high waist offer functionality and style. The contrast topstitching adds a touch of sophistication, while the logo tab at the back waist showcases the brand's attention to detail. The belt loop waistband allows you to accessorize with your favorite belts, while the zipper fly and button closure provide a secure and comfortable fit.

EASY CARE AND MAINTENANCE: Designed for convenience, the slim jeans for women are machine washable and can be tumble dried, making them easy to care for. The durable fabric blend ensures that these jeans will maintain their shape and color even after multiple washes, making them a reliable and stylish addition to your wardrobe.

The KUT from the Kloth Mia High-Rise Ankle Skinny Jeans is a five-pocket jean in a high rise, slim fit, and skinny leg. Whiskered and faded indigo blue wash on stretch cotton-poly denim. Contrast topstitching. Logo tab at back waist. Belt loop waistband. Zipper fly and button closure. 91% cotton, 7% polyester, 2% elastane. Machine wash, tumble dry.
